## readTextFile variable

Generates a [ReadTextFile](./tooling.readtextfile.md) function on top of a [ReadBuffer](./tooling.readbuffer.md) function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readTextFile: (aReadBuffer: ReadBuffer, aEncoding?: string) => ReadTextFile
```
